DEFAULT_ROUNDS.description: Default number of rounds in a game

START.description: Initial soil quality value for a parcel

FALLOW_RECOVERY.description: Soil quality recovery amount when a parcel is left fallow. Scales linearly with 1/totalRounds (via timeScale).

CROP_ROTATION_BONUS.description: Bonus to soil quality for good crop rotation. Scales linearly with 1/totalRounds (via timeScale).

CROP_ROTATION_PENALTY.description: Penalty to soil quality for bad crop rotation. Scales linearly with 1/totalRounds (via timeScale).

FERTILIZER_SYNTHETIC_IMPACT.description: Impact of synthetic fertilizer on soil quality. Scales linearly with 1/totalRounds (via timeScale).

PESTICIDE_IMPACT.description: Impact of pesticide usage on soil quality. Scales linearly with 1/totalRounds (via timeScale).

MACHINE_IMPACT.description: Soil impact of machinery levels 0-4. Level 0: 0 impact, 0% yield bonus. Level 1: -0.2 impact, 10% bonus. Level 2: -0.5 impact, 20% bonus. Level 3: -1.5 impact, 30% bonus. Level 4: -5.0 impact, 40% bonus. Levels are reached through investment (round decision 0-4) which adds up to 1.0 (for decision 4) to the machinery state, while per-round decay removes 10-25%. Effective level is the rounded state. Soil impact scales linearly with 1/totalRounds (via timeScale).

ORGANISMS_SOIL_BONUS.description: Bonus to soil quality from beneficial organisms. Scales linearly with 1/totalRounds (via timeScale).

MONOCULTURE_PENALTY.description: Penalty for repeating the same crop too often. Scales linearly with 1/totalRounds (via timeScale).

NUTRITION_OVER_PENALTY_START.description: Threshold at which over-nutrition starts penalizing the soil

NUTRITION_OVER_PENALTY_FACTOR.description: Scale factor for over-nutrition penalty. Scales linearly with 1/totalRounds (via timeScale).

SYNTHETIC_BURN_THRESHOLD.description: Threshold at which synthetic fertilizer causes 'burn' damage to soil

SYNTHETIC_BURN_PENALTY.description: Penalty applied when nutrition exceeds burn threshold via synthetic fertilizer. Scales linearly with 1/totalRounds (via timeScale).

MAINTENANCE_COST.description: Annual maintenance cost for machinery levels

Normal.description: Baseline weather. Yield impact is absolute (does not scale). Soil impact is zero.

Drought.description: Dry conditions causing 10-30% yield loss (absolute). This aligns with research (e.g., ScienceDirect, 2022) showing single-day losses of ~0.36% for winter wheat, compounding to >20% in severe spells. Soil quality degrades by 0.8 (scales with 1/totalRounds) due to reduced microbial activity and nutrient cycling. Impact is primarily a 'biological pause'.

LateFrost.description: Frost in late spring causing 15% yield loss (absolute). Max Planck Institute research (2021) confirms these events are becoming significantly more likely and pose an 'existential threat' to harvests. Provides a 0.3 soil quality bonus (frost tilth) by breaking up compaction (scales with 1/totalRounds).

HeatWave.description: High evaporation and soil stress causing 20% yield loss (absolute). This aligns with the trend observed in Brás et al. (2021), where the severity of heatwave and drought impacts on European cereals has tripled, reaching ~10% on average with significantly higher losses in extreme years. Soil quality degrades by 1.2 (scales with 1/totalRounds).

Flood.description: Heavy rainfall and flooding causing significant yield failures. Research in Germany (Webber et al., 2020) identifies waterlogging and flooding as key drivers of negative yield anomalies. Game value of 30% loss is a representative average for severe localized inundation. Soil quality degrades severely by 2.0 (scales with 1/totalRounds) due to erosion and anaerobic conditions.

Storm.description: Physical crop damage and surface erosion causing 15% yield loss (absolute). European Parliament study (2023) identifies storms as major drivers of cropland destruction and soil damage. Soil quality degrades by 0.5 (scales with 1/totalRounds).

ORGANIC_CONTROL.description: Annual fee for organic certification control. Does not scale.

FERTILIZE.description: Cost of synthetic fertilization. Scales linearly with 1/totalRounds (via timeScale).

PESTICIDE.description: Cost of pesticides. Scales linearly with 1/totalRounds (via timeScale).

ORGANISMS.description: Cost of beneficial organisms. Scales linearly with 1/totalRounds (via timeScale).

ANIMALS.description: Cost of maintaining animals per unit. Scales linearly with 1/totalRounds (via timeScale).
